faq.name: faq
faq.label: FAQ
faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions About Video Text Removal
faq.description: Have more questions? Contact us via live chat or email.

items.title: What video formats are supported?
items.description: We support all major video formats including MP4, AVI, MOV, WMV, FLV, and more. Perfect for videos from both mobile devices and professional equipment.

items.title: How is the video quality after processing?
items.description: Our advanced AI technology ensures that video quality remains intact while removing text. Background restoration is natural with no visible processing artifacts.

items.title: How long does it take to process a video?
items.description: Processing time depends on video length and the amount of text to be removed. Typically, a 5-minute video takes about 3-5 minutes to process.

items.title: How do you ensure my video's security?
items.description: We use enterprise-grade encryption to protect your video files. All uploaded content is stored on secure cloud servers and automatically deleted within 24 hours after processing.
